price: Utusan-utusan itu berkata, "Kemalangan kamu itu adalah karena kamu sendiri.  Apakah jika kamu diberi peringatan (kamu mengancam kami)? Sebenarnya, kamu adalah kaum yang melampui batas".
arabic: قَالُواْ طَٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمۡ أَئِن ذُكِّرۡتُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū ṭāirukum maʿakum a-in dhukkir'tum bal antum qawmun mus'rifūna
